ValidationRule.description: Require Escalation Contact or Escalation Details if certain Eligibility Escalation Path values are chosen
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL( Eligibility_Escalation_Path__c ,"Escalate to Defined Contact (Provide Details)" ), ISBLANK( Escalation_Contact__c )), AND( ISPICKVAL( Eligibility_Escalation_Path__c ,"Complex Escalation (Provide Details)" ), ISBLANK( Escalation_Details__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If either "Escalate to Defined Contact" or "Complex Escalation" are selected as the Eligibility Escalation Path, you must provide details in the corresponding field.
